explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the development of an Artificial Intelligence model to classify footwear slip resistance, which falls under the umbrella of machine learning.
explanations.supervised learning: The model was trained on a dataset with labeled slip resistance ratings, indicating a supervised learning approach.
explanations.classification: The AI model classifies footwear outsoles into high and low slip resistance categories.
explanations.neural network: The study mentions the use of a 2D convolutional neural network for classification.
explanations.deep learning: The use of a convolutional neural network (a type of deep learning model) is highlighted in the paper.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The paper specifically mentions the application of a 2D convolutional neural network for image classification.
explanations.CNN: Abbreviation for convolutional neural network, which is used in the study.
explanations.transfer learning: The paper mentions applying a transfer learning technique to develop the convolutional neural network, using the Xception pre-trained model.
